data.title: bd-2lj: fix maw status --watch broken rendering
data.description:
Fix raw terminal rendering in watch mode. In raw mode, 
 only moves cursor down without carriage return. Replace 
 with 
 when watching=true so output renders correctly.

data.reason: No security concerns. Minimal change: applies existing \\n→\\r\\n pattern to render_with_format() for raw terminal mode consistency. No user input, no new command execution, no path handling changes.

No security concerns. Change is a terminal rendering fix: replaces \n with \r\n when in raw terminal mode (watch). All data is internally generated — no user input flows through this code path. No injection, disclosure, or resource risks.

Security review: No concerns. The change is a safe string transformation (\n → \r\n) on internally-generated status output. No user-controlled input reaches this code path, no new attack surface introduced.
